ca.uwaterloo.epad.ui

Class CloseButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • vialab.SMT.PGraphicsDelegate
      • vialab.SMT.Zone
        • ca.uwaterloo.epad.ui.CloseButton
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.util.EventListener, processing.core.PConstants

    public class CloseButton
extends vialab.SMT.Zone
    This class represents a close button widget that can be added to any zone and will attempt to close or remove the parent when pressed.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Dmitry Pyryeskin
